root.name: Client
root.description: A client connects to a server and sends data back and forth.

method.mdescription: Makes a GET request to the server to retrieve specified content.
Makes a POST request to the server.
Reads one byte from the server.
Reads one byte from the server and returns its character equivalent.
Returns the response from the server in a byte array.
Returns the response from the server as a String.

cparameter.cdescription: String: name of server to connect to (i.e. "processing.org")
int: port on which to connect to, defaults to 80
